name: minimalist google docs
description: Google Docs, stripped away until you've only got text and tools.
additional_info:
It's really nothing fancy, so you might find some spots that you want to change for yourself.

I like to use this style 
- without Print Layout because the page break lines don't appear when in Print Layout mode, and it just looks like there's a lot of nothing between the pages.
- with a white Page Color.
- with Compact Controls on.
- with Chrome on Full Screen.
